title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, July 18, 2020
description: On this day in 1877, inventor Thomas Edison recorded the human voice for the first time at his laboratory in Menlo Park, New Jersey.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1877, inventor Thomas Edison recorded the human voice for the first time at his laboratory in Menlo Park, New Jersey.
